com.cj.tvui.util

Class ImagePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cj.tvui.util.ImagePool

  • public class ImagePool
extends java.lang.Object
    An image pool. This class caches images by name.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImagePool()
      This constructor is required to call setComponent(Component) before using the instance of this class.

      • checkAll

        public boolean checkAll()
        Checks to see if all images in this ImagePool have finished loading. this method starts loading any images that are not yet being loaded.
        Returns:
        true if all images have finished loading, have been aborted, or have encountered an error; false otherwise.

      • waitForAll

        public void waitForAll()
        Waits for all images in this ImagePool.
